concept.title: Calculation Detail

othermeta.name: shortdesc

conbody.p: The Calculation Detail page displays a set of all order line items for products, categories, and CPG's. These order line items are either raised on the order management application or they are imported into the CIM from the SAP. The CIM buckets the lines into the schedule based on the pricing date. Analysts view the set of all order line items in a schedule, based on the pricing date on the order line item. If the Pricing date falls within a scheduled period, the same date reflects on the Calculation details page.

You can see each order line item level details here. You can also see the freight charges for each order line item if specified. You can also see the total freight charges applicable at the schedule level in the Schedule Period Information section.

note.p: The Account Number and Section ID columns are displayed for the Reward Saving Program - Revenue Tier.
